summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; adding new sections 24.60.427 and 24.60.171 to and amending sections 24.60.610, 24.60.445 and 23.84.040 of the Seattle Municipal Code to establish a procedure for an independent, preliminary shoreline permit decision for uses which are permitted in the Shoreline District only if no reasonable or feasible alternative exists.
